alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued March 09 at 3:47PM HST until March 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH TONIGHT... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH TONIGHT... .A large long period northwest swell will continue to bring warning level surf to north and west facing shores of the smaller islands and to west facing shores of Leeward Big Island. The swell will decline and become north northwesterly Friday through the weekend. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves 20 to 25 feet along north facing shores and 15 to 20 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
